briefdescription.para: List that maps between event touch IDs and normalised touch IDs.
Last mouse position for calculating movement.
Last mouse position before being set to not visible.
Mouse wheel movement since last frame.
Input coordinate scaling. Non-unity when window and backbuffer have different sizes (e.g. Retina display).
Operating system mouse cursor visible flag.
The last operating system mouse cursor visible flag set by end use call to SetMouseVisible.
Flag to indicate the mouse is being grabbed by an operation. Subsystems like UI that uses mouse should temporarily ignore the mouse hover or click events.
The last mouse grabbed set by SetMouseGrabbed.
Determines the mode of mouse behaviour.
The last mouse mode set by SetMouseMode.
Flag to determine whether SDL mouse relative was used.
Gained focus on this frame flag.
Whether mouse move is accumulated in backbuffer scale or not (when using events directly).
Poll for window messages. Called by HandleBeginFrame().

detaileddescription.para: Set whether ALT-ENTER fullscreen toggle is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set whether the operating system mouse cursor is visible. When not visible (default), is kept centered to prevent leaving the window. Mouse visibility event can be suppressed this also recalls any unsuppressed SetMouseVisible which can be returned by ResetMouseVisible().
Reset last mouse visibility that was not suppressed in SetMouseVisible.
Set whether the mouse is currently being grabbed by an operation.
Reset the mouse grabbed to the last unsuppressed SetMouseGrabbed call.

detaileddescription.para: Set the mouse mode behaviour. MM_ABSOLUTE is the default behaviour, allowing the toggling of operating system cursor visibility and allowing the cursor to escape the window when visible. When the operating system cursor is invisible in absolute mouse mode, the mouse is confined to the window. If the operating system and UI cursors are both invisible, interaction with the Urho UI will be limited (eg: drag move / drag end events will not trigger). SetMouseMode(MM_ABSOLUTE) will call SetMouseGrabbed(false).

MM_RELATIVE sets the operating system cursor to invisible and confines the cursor to the window. The operating system cursor cannot be set to be visible in this mode via SetMouseVisible(), however changes are tracked and will be restored when another mouse mode is set. When the virtual cursor is also invisible, UI interaction will still function as normal (eg: drag events will trigger). SetMouseMode(MM_RELATIVE) will call SetMouseGrabbed(true).

MM_WRAP grabs the mouse from the operating system and confines the operating system cursor to the window, wrapping the cursor when it is near the edges. SetMouseMode(MM_WRAP) will call SetMouseGrabbed(true).

MM_FREE does not grab/confine the mouse cursor even when it is hidden. This can be used for cases where the cursor should render using the operating system outside the window, and perform custom rendering (with SetMouseVisible(false)) inside.

briefdescription.para: Reset the last mouse mode that wasn't suppressed in SetMouseMode.

detaileddescription.para: Return the joystick instance ID when successful or negative on error. If layout file is not given, use the default screen joystick layout. If style file is not given, use the default style file from root UI element.
This method should only be called in main thread.

briefdescription.para: Remove screen joystick by instance ID.

detaileddescription.para: Return true if successful.
This method should only be called in main thread.
Set whether the virtual joystick is visible. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Show or hide on-screen keyboard on platforms that support it. When shown, keypresses from it are delivered as key events. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set touch emulation by mouse. Only available on desktop platforms. When enabled, actual mouse events are no longer sent and the mouse cursor is forced visible. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Begin recording a touch gesture. Return true if successful. The E_GESTURERECORDED event (which contains the ID for the new gesture) will be sent when recording finishes.
Save all in-memory touch gestures. Return true if successful.
Save a specific in-memory touch gesture to a file. Return true if successful.
Load touch gestures from a file. Return number of loaded gestures, or 0 on failure.
Remove an in-memory gesture by ID. Return true if was found.

detaileddescription.para: Set the mouse cursor position. Uses the backbuffer (Graphics width/height) coordinates. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return name of key from keycode.
Return name of key from scancode.

detaileddescription.para: Check if a key is held down. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a key has been pressed on this frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a key is held down by scancode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a key has been pressed on this frame by scancode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a mouse button is held down. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a mouse button has been pressed on this frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a qualifier key is held down. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Check if a qualifier key has been pressed on this frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the currently held down qualifiers. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mouse position within window. Should only be used with a visible mouse cursor. Uses the backbuffer (Graphics width/height) coordinates. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mouse movement since last frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return horizontal mouse movement since last frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return vertical mouse movement since last frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mouse wheel movement since last frame. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return input coordinate scaling. Should return non-unity on High DPI display. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return number of active finger touches. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return active finger touch by index. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_touches
Return number of connected joysticks. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return joystick state by ID, or null if does not exist. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_joysticks
Return joystick state by index, or null if does not exist. 0 = first connected joystick. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_joysticksByIndex
Return joystick state by name, or null if does not exist. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_joysticksByName
Return whether fullscreen toggle is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether a virtual joystick is visible. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether on-screen keyboard is supported. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether on-screen keyboard is being shown. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether touch emulation is enabled. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether the operating system mouse cursor is visible. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether the mouse is currently being grabbed by an operation. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether the mouse is locked to the window. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the mouse mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether application window has input focus. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_focus
Return whether application window is minimized. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Initialize when screen mode initially set.
Open a joystick and return its ID. Return -1 if no joystick.
Prepare input state for application gaining input focus.
Prepare input state for application losing input focus.
Clear touch states and send touch end events.
Get the index of a touch based on the touch ID.
Used internally to return and remove the next available touch index.
Push a touch index back into the list of available when finished with it.
Send an input focus or window minimization change event.
Handle touch events from the controls of screen joystick(s).
Input subsystem. Converts operating system window messages to input state and events.
